svt_i2c_system_env Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_system_env:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is the System ENV class which contains all of the elements of an I2C System. The I2C System ENV encapsulates master agents, slave agents, system sequencer and the system configuration.

The number of master and slave agents is configured based on the system configuration provided by the user. In the build phase, the System ENV builds the master and slave agents. After the master & slave agents are built, the System ENV configures them using the configuration information available in the system configuration.
